anecdotes.content: Programming is like writing a book... except if you miss out a single comma on page 126, the whole thing makes no sense.
anecdotes.author: Anonymous

anecdotes.content: Debugging is like being the detective in a crime movie where you are also the murderer.
anecdotes.author: Filipe Fortes

anecdotes.content: There are only two kinds of languages: the ones people complain about and the ones nobody uses.
anecdotes.author: Bjarne Stroustrup
